title: [CLIENT] Store is broken
body:
The layout is confused, like a web page that didn't load all the way. The tabs are gone, left are blue links that lead nowhere. The Champion Sale banner is still visible.

Edit: lol jk it's better

replies.body: aaaaaaand I bought a mystery skin and got nothing thx to bug
https://gyazo.com/e0c87c992b3e567f28f68e459fdfbf53 this is what the store looks like for me
http://puu.sh/ksQUV/cd3172fa75.jpg Can confirm store is very broken
It's strange, mabye rito is going to fix it by tomorrow
For a while I couldn't buy any champs or skins but it just now let me buy vayne :3
